word:
Thursday morning, Sara came to my room, and told me it was time to go to the early meeting. I had been writing since 
                                                                           296
three o'clock. I attended the meeting, and spoke for about three-quarters of an hour, and then there was a testimony meeting. I could not hear what was said, but I was told that it was an interesting meeting. In all my talks I have tried to present Christ as our wisdom, our sanctification, and our righteousness. 

                                               -
